DataElement.preferredName: Last Year Bacterial Vaginosis Occurrence Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Count of Bacterial Vaginosis (BV) occurrences over the last year

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Related to Bacterial Vaginosis (BV) occurrences over the last year

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.:Infection caused by bacterial overgrowth in the vagina. Most affected women are asymptomatic. When symptoms occur, they include foul-smelling vaginal discharge, vaginal itching, and burning. Risk factors include sexual activity with multiple partners and the use of vaginal douches and intrauterine devices. Up to a third of cases resolve without treatment. Antibiotic treatment is recommended when symptoms are present and for women that are pregnant at the time of infection.

Concepts.definition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.

Infection caused by bacterial overgrowth in the vagina. Most affected women are asymptomatic. When symptoms occur, they include foul-smelling vaginal discharge, vaginal itching, and burning. Risk factors include sexual activity with multiple partners and the use of vaginal douches and intrauterine devices. Up to a third of cases resolve without treatment. Antibiotic treatment is recommended when symptoms are present and for women that are pregnant at the time of infection.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The quantity of the specified item.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: Determining the number or amount of something.
